name: The Mother of Allegranzia Appealing to Saints Aimo and Vermondo to Save Her Child
description: The Mother of Allegranzia Appealing to Saints Aimo and Vermondo to Save Her Child; Attributed to Anovelo da Imbonate (Italian (Lombard), active about 1400); Milan, Lombardia, Italy; about 1400; Tempera colors, gold leaf, and ink on parchment; Leaf: 25.6 x 18.4 cm (10 1/16 x 7 1/4 in.); Ms. 26, fol. 8v; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Mother of Allegranzia Appealing to Saints Aimo and Vermondo to Save Her Child
medium: Tempera colors, gold leaf, and ink on parchment
